title: Backbreaker
content:
Backbreaker Class Actions 5~8 Damage 1d4+4Slashing Possibly knock your enemy Prone. 2 turns Melee STR Save Attack Roll Short Rest Action

Possibly knock your enemy Prone.

Melee STR Save Attack Roll Short Rest

Backbreaker is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
